conbody.p: The DITA4publishers is released under the Apache License V2.0
However the html5 plugins used different libraries that are released in both GPL and MIT licenses.
If you want to not use certain library or replace others, the architecture of the plugin allows you to do it easely. Please see the developper section for this purpose

section.title: jQuery
section.p: jQuery is released under the MIT license.

section.title: jQuery UI
section.p: The jQuery UI library is currently available for use in all personal or commercial projects under both MIT and GPL licenses.

section.title: 960 Grid System
section.p: The 960 Grid System is released both under GPL and MIT.

section.title: jQuery BBQ: Back Button & Query Library
section.p: The jQuery BBQ: Back Button & Query Library is released under GPL and MIT licenses.

section.title: Modernizr
section.p: Modernizr is available under the MIT license.
